resources.string: \ This game is played just like regular Tic Tac Toe with one difference: to win a tile you have to win a smaller game of Tic Tac Toe inside that tile.\n\ \n\ A tie happens when there are no further moves. In the case of a tie in a small board, that will count as a win for both sides in the larger game.
Master of Science in Computer Science

\ This game is played just like regular Boggle and Scramble game. Except that it has two rounds.
\ 
\ In PHASE-1, you have to find 9 words from each of the 9 letters in 1.5 minute like a Boggle Game. Such that each next letter should be horizontal, vertical or diagonal adjacent to the selected letter. 
\ You CANNOT REUSE the letter in the first phase of the game.
\ 
\ Similarly in PHASE-2, you have to make words from the letters of the words which were made in the first round in another 1.5 minute. 
\ Here you CAN REUSE the letter but one not consecutively.
\ 
\ Scoring is based on the words prepared. And weightage of each letters used to prepare that word.
\

\ Pictures: depositphotos
\ dreamstime
\ lisamarieandjayscrabblepieces

\

\

\ 
\
Let us start the phase-2 of the game.
